verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: Worship we the Godhead, Love incarnate, Love divine; worship we our Jesus, but wherewith for sacred sign?

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Love shall be our token, love be yours and love be mine; love to God and others, love for plea and gift and sign.
